All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Add
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the details for a new book and posts them
AddResult
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a table that shows the new book just added and to update the database with a new record
AllBooks
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a table holding all the records for books from the database
Book
The purpose of this class is to represent a book record
BookDao
The purpose of this class is to connect to the database and call records from the database
ConsoleMenu
The purpose of this class is to construct the console menu, accept and validate user inputs and call functions from the BookDAO
Controller
The purpose of this class is to run the console Menu
Delete
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the details of which book to delete and posts them
DeleteResult
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a table that shows the deleted book and to update the database by deleting the record
ISBNValidator
The purpose of this class is to validate isbn strings
LoginServlet
The purpose of this class is to validate the user's username and password and redirect them as appropriate
LogoutServlet
The purpose of this class is to log the user out and redirect them to the RootServlet login page
MainServlet
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with navigation buttons to other pages and a logout form
PasswordHasher
The purpose of this class is to hash passwords with md5
RootServlet
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a form that requests the user's username and password and post them on
Search
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with several buttons and hidden forms which the buttons reveal and post the forms
SearchResult
The purpose of this class is to conduct a search on the database and build a HTML page with a table which displays the results
ServerController
The purpose of this class is to run the server to host the website
ServerStartup
The purpose of this class is to set the servlet handlers and start the server
Update
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a form that collects ID number of a book and a new price and post them
UpdateResult
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a table that shows the updated book and to update the database record
UserDao
The purpose of this class is to connect to the database and check passwords and usernames from the database
